dmca.title: DMCA NOTICE-requires immediate attention
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Krutie [mailto:abuse@sexyfur.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2006 9:43 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@sexyfur.com
Subject: DMCA NOTICE-requires immediate attention



 

 

Monitor Studios LLC

411 Walnut St #2593 - Green Cove Springs, FL 32043


Phone: (919) 924-6603


Email: jbernal@monitorstudios.biz


March 14, 2006

 

 


Introduction and Cover Letter


 

Emailed to copyright@theplanet.com


This is formal notification that your service is being used to violate
copyright law under the DMCA TITLE 17, CHAPTER 5, Sec. 512 of the United
States Code.

The following information should help you to identify/remove or terminate
the service of the individual(s) violating copyright of our protected work.
We request that the individual's website be terminated and the individual(s)
banned from your service.

I am writing this letter to you in regards to the following website address:

http://onechan.net/f/

http://onechan.net/f/1.html

 

This website is located at the following IP address, which is hosted within
your system at:

IP Address:  70.86.115.162 (ARIN & RIPE IP search) 

IP Location:   - Texas - Dallas - Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc

 

Domain Name:onechan.net
Administrative Contact:
      Private, Registration   <http://www.whois.sc/whois-privacy/> 
      Domains by Proxy, Inc.
      DomainsByProxy.com
      15111 N. Hayden Rd., Ste 160, PMB 353
      Scottsdale, Arizona 85260
      United States
      (480) 624-2599


This website is illegally distributing copyrighted and stolen content.  The
web  publications we produce are being distributed with this system (a list
of the actual files will be displayed within the DMCA notice below).

We request that you disable this website.  Also, we ask that you retain any
information related to the owner/operator of this website pending possible
future violations.

Information regarding the DMCA violations and Formal Notification letter
follow.
DMCA TITLE 17, CHAPTER 5, Sec. 512 of the United States Code

 

Elements of Notification:

 

To be effective under this subsection, a notification of claimed
infringement must be a written communication provided to the designated
agent of a service provider that includes substantially the following: 

 

(i)  A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

 

The signature of the authorized person acting on behalf of the copyright
owner(s) is written and dated at the bottom of this notice.

 

(ii)  Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed,
or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a
single notification, a representative list of such works at that site. 

 

Many images from our commercial paid member website located at
http://www.sexyfur.com.

The described publications were created in digital format for transmission
on the Internet via our website located at http://www.sexyfur.com.  All the
infringed works have been copied from the company website.

 

(iii)  Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to
be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to
which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the
service provider to locate the material. 

 

http://onechan.net/f/

 

http://onechan.net/f/1.html

 

More specifically:

 

http://onechan.net/f/src/1141794849307.jpg

 

http://onechan.net/f/src/1141760531105.jpg

 

 

 




(iv)  Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to
contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be
contacted. 

 

Monitor Studios LLC
411 Walnut St #2593
Green Cove Springs, FL 32043



Phone: (919) 924-6603
Email: jbernal@monitorstudios.biz
Attn:  Jeremy Bernal

 

(v)  A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that use
of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

We believe in good faith that these works are not being provided with our
permission or under lawful purposes, neither are they being distributed
legally under the doctrines of Fair Use.  Monitor Studios LLC and its agents
have not given authorization, either written, verbally, or by inferred
consent for these works to be converted from their original format,
advertised, and electronically distributed on the Internet by the owner(s)
of the website located at your service under the URL of http://wtfux.org/

 

(vi)  A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

 

I, Jeremy Bernal, under penalty of perjury, affirm and swear that the
information contained in this notice is accurate as of the time of this
statement and that I am acting on behalf of Monitor Studios LLC, which owns
the copyright to the above stated works directly or is the authorized
representative for copyright enforcement on any works bearing the Monitor
Studios LLC company seal.

 

 

 

Signature of Authorized Representative                     Date of Notice

 

                      Jeremy Bernal
03/14/2006
